experiment: E1 vs E32 vs E33 simplification comparison

results.notes: Self-gating h*silu(h) beats separate z branch. 7% faster, 20% fewer params, better loss.

conclusions: E33 self-gating is a promising simplification of E1
Removing pre-silu (E32) hurts performance by ~0.04 nats
Self-gating (output = h * silu(h)) outperforms separate z gating (output = h * silu(z))
E33 achieves: better loss, 7% faster throughput, 20% fewer parameters
